preface.title: Acknowledgments
preface.para: We are indebted to Alexandra M. Karacozoff, the Associate Editor, for her exceptional editing and proofreading abilities, as well as her other important contributions to this textbook.
We are grateful to Crystal Newton and Anastasios Karatopis for their amazing artistic talents that resulted in the creation of an extraordinary cover.

Special thanks to Mark Bass for his extensive experience and great efforts that helped make this textbook possible by taking care of the overall production of this project and providing careful attention to an incredible list of details.
